title: LyondellBasell's new CFO Michael McMurray was Owens Corning's CFO
text: LyondellBasell Industries N.V. LYB, +4.95% said Monday it named Michael McMurray as its chief financial officer, effective Nov. 5. McMurray, who was most recently CFO of Owens Corning OC, +1.35% for the past seven years, succeeds Thomas Aebischer who earlier this year elected to retire. Owens Corning said it named Vice President of Corporate Strategy Prith Gandhi as interim CFO while the company conducts an external search. The plastics, chemicals and refining company is projected to report third-quarter results on or around Oct. 29, according to FactSet. Owens Corning and LyondellBasell shares were still inactive in premarket trading. Over the past three months, Owens Corning's stock has rallied 9.2% and LyondellBasel shares have gained 2.4%, while the S&P 500 SPX, +1.09% has slipped 1.4%.
